frameDefinitions: A Cause or Agent causes a Patient to undergo a change of phase.
An Agent causes a Fire to no longer burn.
An Agent finishes an Activity, which can no longer logically continue.
In this frame a Patient is in a phase brought about after a change of phase.

A Financial_instrument (a bond or insurance) fulfills a condition at a certain Time after which the Issuer of the Financial_instrument is legally obligated to pay the Holder a monetary Value, based on the instrument's original Principle and the Interest rate.
Some Protection prevents a Danger from harming an Asset.
frameExamples: Jason <t>completed</t> grading the papers late Sunday night.
Collect up the  <t>thawed</t> water from the freezer section.
The bond had <t>matured</t> to its full value at 30 years.
The rubber on her sneakers <t>protected</t> her from the mud.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Agent</fen> causes the <fen>Patient</fen> to change phase.
The <fen>Patient</fen> undergoes a change of phase brought about by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
The <fen>Cause</fen> is the non-<fen>Agent</fen> which brings about the change in the <fen>Patient</fen>.
This role identifies the Time at which the change of phase occurs.
This role identifies the place where change of phase occurs.
The individual or group that causes the <fen>Fire</fen> to no longer burn.
The combustion process that the <fen>Agent</fen> causes to end.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Fire</fen> goes out.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Agent</fen> puts out the <fen>Fire</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Agent</fen> who has finished an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Activity</fen> that the <fen>Agent</fen> has finished.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Activity</fen> finishes.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Agent</fen> finishes the <fen>Activity</fen>.
The <fen>Substance</fen> is the entity which has had its phase altered.
The bond, insurance, or debt security which a Holder buys from an Issuer.
When the <fen>Financial_instrument</fen> reaches maturity.
The person, entity, or action that prevents harm to an <fen>Asset</fen>.
A situation that could damage the <fen>Asset</fen>.
Something desirable possessed by or directly associated with the <fen>Protection</fen> which might be lost or damaged.
The time when the <fen>Danger</fen> threatens.
The place where the <fen>Danger</fen> threatened the <fen>Asset</fen>.
listRoleExamples: It took four days before <fex>the fire</fex>was extinguished.
<fex>The tabloid's deal with the woman</fex> shielded Schwarzenegger.

Other nations tended to muffle or modulate their occasional annoyance with the
country that was their shield <fex>against the Soviet threat</fex>.
Almost 10 years later, that agreement insulated <fex>Microsoft</fex> from liability on copyright claims over the graphical user interface (GUI).
Regardless of the distribution media, USPTO information is safeguarded <fex>before, during, and after dissemination</fex> from improper access and modification.
To make his way on a foreign soil, he needed different guardians from those that protected him <fex>in his own birthplace</fex> .

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations
